meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with small, daisy-like flowers.
meanings.sent1: The erigeron in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of erigeron for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The erigeron seemed to wink at me in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and cheerful as a field of erigeron.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the erigeron danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the daisy family.
meanings.sent1: Erigeron plants are known for their resilience.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the different species of erigeron.
meanings.sent3: The erigeron family reunion was a blooming success.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, we are all unique erigeron flowers.
meanings.sent5: The field was a sea of colorful erigeron, a sight to behold.
